de: Organised around the old silk mill, the real soul of the place, this haven of peace with a family atmosphere offers all the services of a large campsite. During the season, you can take advantage of the bread and pastry service (on order), come and quench your thirst or eat an ice cream at the bar or have a meal. Once you have settled in, all you have to do is enjoy your holiday to the full.
ru: Organised around the old silk mill, the real soul of the place, this haven of peace with a family atmosphere offers all the services of a large campsite. During the season, you can take advantage of the bread and pastry service (on order), come and quench your thirst or eat an ice cream at the bar or have a meal. Once you have settled in, all you have to do is enjoy your holiday to the full.

Once you have settled in, all you have to do is enjoy your holiday to the full.
it: Organised around the old silk mill, the real soul of the place, this haven of peace with a family atmosphere offers all the services of a large campsite. During the season, you can take advantage of the bread and pastry service (on order), come and quench your thirst or eat an ice cream at the bar or have a meal. Once you have settled in, all you have to do is enjoy your holiday to the full.
fr: Organisé autour de l'ancienne filature de soie, véritable âme du lieu, ce havre de paix à l'ambiance familiale offre tous les services d'un grand camping. En saison, vous pourrez profiter du service du dépôt de pains et de viennoiseries (sur commande).
zh: Organised around the old silk mill, the real soul of the place, this haven of peace with a family atmosphere offers all the services of a large campsite. During the season, you can take advantage of the bread and pastry service (on order), come and quench your thirst or eat an ice cream at the bar or have a meal. Once you have settled in, all you have to do is enjoy your holiday to the full.
es: Organised around the old silk mill, the real soul of the place, this haven of peace with a family atmosphere offers all the services of a large campsite. During the season, you can take advantage of the bread and pastry service (on order), come and quench your thirst or eat an ice cream at the bar or have a meal. Once you have settled in, all you have to do is enjoy your holiday to the full.
nl: Georganiseerd rond de oude zijdefabriek, de echte ziel van de plaats, biedt deze oase van rust met een familiale sfeer alle diensten van een grote camping. Tijdens het seizoen kunt u gebruik maken van de brood- en gebakenservice (op bestelling), uw dorst komen lessen of een ijsje eten aan de bar of een maaltijd nuttigen. Als u eenmaal gesetteld bent, hoeft u alleen nog maar volop van uw vakantie te genieten.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme du Pays de Lamastre

hasBeenPublishedBy.schema:legalName: Agence de Développement Touristique de l'Ardèche - source : Apidae Tourisme

de: Montag, Dienstag, Mittwoch, Donnerstag, Freitag, Samstag, Sonntag: offen
en: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday: open
it: Lunedì, martedì, mercoledì, giovedì, venerdì, sabato, domenica: aperto
fr: Lundi, Mardi, Mercredi, Jeudi, Vendredi, Samedi, Dimanche : ouvert
nl: Maandag, dinsdag, woensdag, donderdag, vrijdag, zaterdag, zondag: open
es: Lunes, martes, miércoles, jueves, viernes, sábado y domingo: abierto
